scripts.lint: echo Checking for lint errors... && eslint ./src --ext .ts && stylelint "./src/**/*.scss"
scripts.lint:fix: echo Checking and fixing lint errors... && eslint ./src --fix --ext .ts && stylelint "./src/**/*.scss" --fix
scripts.webpack:chromium: echo Building platform CHROMIUM to ./build/chromium... && rimraf ./build/chromium && webpack app=./src/modules/webext/chromium/chromium-app/chromium-app.module.ts background=./src/modules/webext/chromium/chromium-background/chromium-background.module.ts webpage-metadata-collecter=./src/modules/webext/webpage-metadata-collecter/webpage-metadata-collecter.ts --output-path ./build/chromium/assets --config ./webpack/webext.config.js --mode development
scripts.build:chromium: npm run lint:fix && npm run webpack:chromium
scripts.package:chromium: npm run lint:fix && echo Packaging platform CHROMIUM... && rimraf ./build/chromium && webpack app=./src/modules/webext/chromium/chromium-app/chromium-app.module.ts background=./src/modules/webext/chromium/chromium-background/chromium-background.module.ts webpage-metadata-collecter=./src/modules/webext/webpage-metadata-collecter/webpage-metadata-collecter.ts --output-path ./build/chromium/assets --config ./webpack/webext.config.js --mode production && node ./scripts/update-build-number.js chromium && node ./scripts/create-zip-package.js chromium
